resources.string: Use your Android device as a wireless barcode scanner for your PC/Laptop

BarcodeOverIP Client 1.0.1-Beta1
©2012 - Tyler H. Jones
Project Website: http://boip.tylerjones.me

Welcome to BarcodeOverIP for Android!
To get started you must add a server by pressing 'Menu' > 'Add Server'. Once you have added one or more servers, to scan a barcode, simply touch the desired server on the list and scan away!
To edit/remove a server, press and hold the target server in the list and a menu will appear.
 **NOTE: The server application is available on the project site and the Google Code site as well.

 http://boip.tylerjones.me
 http://b.thj.me/donate
Edit servers activity is not done yet! Try again later!
Enter the new server\'s details and click \'Save Server\' or press the back button to continue.
Change the desired values then click \'Save Server\' or press the back button to continue.
Are you sure you want to delete the selected server and all it\'s configuration data?

The given server nickname already exists in the defined servers list!
Duplicate server nicknames are not allowed in the defined servers list

Would you like to fix this conflict? If so, press 'Yes', otherwise pressing 'No' will cancel the server configuration and leave all settings untouched.

The given hostname/IP already exists in the defined servers list!
Duplicate hostname/IP values are not allowed in the defined servers list

Would you like to fix this conflict? If so, press 'Yes', otherwise pressing 'No' will cancel the server configuration and leave all settings untouched.
The given port does not fall within the range of valid port numbers\nValid Range: Between 1 - 65535
The given port is not a valid integer data type!
There are unsaved changes to the current server\'s configuration settings! Would you like to save them now?

As long as this screen is visible, BarcodeOverIP will continue to look for active servers on the local network that are listening on the specified port. Set a custom port to look for servers with by editing the field below and pressing \'Apply Port\'.
No Servers Defined! Press the \'Menu\' button and add one.
Tap here to scan a barcode.
Pick a target for the widget to use.
